name: CO_Runner
description:
CO_Runner is a 3D Parkour Speedrunner created by a team of 5 in Spring of 2017.  Their lead artist focused on custom animations and high-res rendering.  The programming team created their own custom FPS controller in Unity.

Collin M - Art/Animation and Programming

Dan W - Art/UI and Design

Dan S - Design

Guangchen W - Programming

A. Achindoba - Programming
